description: TEHRAN – Tractor and Sepahan football teams shared the spoils in a goalless draw in the 2023/24 Iran Persian Gulf Pro League (PGPL) on Wednesday.
title: Tractor, Sepahan share spoils in goalless draw: PGPL

description: TEHRAN – The UN Security Council held a meeting on Tuesday at the request of Iran, Syria, and Russia to discuss an Israeli attack on the Iranian embassy in Damascus, which killed 13 people including senior Iranian military advisers.
title: Western hypocrisy highlighted amid global outcry over embassy attack

description: TEHRAN – Tehran will take Israel to court for the regime’s Monday attack on the Iranian embassy in Damascus which has led to the death of at least 13 people including a top military general and his deputy.
title: Iran to file complaint against Israel after attack on embassy

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution, Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, has asserted that the Israeli regime will face repercussions for its recent attack on the premises of the Iranian embassy in Syria’s capital.
title: Israel will receive slap in the face for Damascus attack: Leader

description: The European Union on Wednesday condemned an airstrike on the Iranian embassy in Damascus on April 1 that killed seven people and called on countries in the region to show restraint, Reuters reported.
title: EU condemns attack on Iran's embassy in Damascus

description: TEHRAN- Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi declared on Wednesday that the world and the region have been irreversibly altered by the Al-Aqsa Storm Operation.
title: President Raisi asserts irreversible shift post Al-Aqsa Storm Operation

description: Madrid - At least seven members of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps of Iran, including General Mohammad Reza Zahedi, a prominent member of the Quds Force responsible for overseas operations, and his deputy, Mohammad Hadi Haj Rahimi, have been killed in an Israeli attack in Syria.
title: Israeli Strike Targets Iran's Embassy in Damascus: Escalating Tensions in the Region

description: TEHRAN- In a statement released by the Iranian Army concerning Quds Day, a resolute emphasis has been placed on resistance as the sole solution to the Palestine issue, advocating for the fight until the complete dismantling of the Zionist regime.
title: Iranian Army asserts resistance as sole solution to Palestine issue

description: TEHRAN – The head of Iran's Parliament National Security and Foreign Policy Committee denounced the Israeli assault on the Iranian consulate in Damascus as a clear indicator of the "diminished strength" of the regime.
title: Israel attack on embassy in Damascus shows regime weakness: MP

description: TEHRAN – In a diplomatic exchange in Islamabad, Pakistan's Prime Minister has emphasized the pivotal nature of the bilateral relations with Iran, particularly focusing on economic and trade cooperation.
title: Pakistan's PM highlights bilateral relations with Iran

description: TEHRAN - In a note, the Iran newspaper addressed the terrorist attack on the Iranian consulate building in Damascus by the Zionist regime and said: With this barbaric act, it seems that the leaders of Israel are at the end of their political life, because in their opinion, by spreading the scope of the war to the surrounding environment, they will burn Iran and the Middle East in the flames of this crisis.
title: We will make them regret

description: TEHRAN- A senior commander of Iran’s Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) paid tribute to the late Brigadier General Zahedi, hailing his pivotal role in championing the cause of justice over injustice.
title: IRGC commander hails General Zahedi as beacon of righteousness

description: TEHRAN - Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi has characterized the recent actions of the Zionist regime as desperate measures, asserting that Israel's behavior demonstrates a disregard for human and international norms.
title: Insane actions of Zionists are their last efforts, says Raisi

description: NATO has begun debating a plan to provide more predictable military support to Ukraine in the coming years, as the Russian invasion grinds on.
title: NATO mulls long-term military support plan for Ukraine

description: American officials, speaking anonymously to US news outlet Politico, expressed scepticism at Israeli claims that the aid worker killings were “unintentional” and whether those responsible would be held to account.
title: US officials express doubt over Israeli claims on convoy killings: Politico

description: Israel has continued to block the UN Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees (UNRWA) from bringing food and other aid into northern Gaza, where hunger is most prevalent, UNRWA says in its latest situation update.
title: UNRWA: Israel continues to deny agency aid access to north Gaza

description: Poland’s Foreign Ministry reiterated Palestinians’ right to establish an independent state and called out Israel’s “abuse” of force – a further indication of strained ties between Israel and Poland following the killing of a Polish aid worker.
title: Poland: Palestinians have right to statehood

description: UN Special Rapporteur Francesca Albanese said, based on an assessment, that she believes the Israeli military “intentionally killed” the seven aid workers in Gaza to scare donors of humanitarian relief and ensure the continued starvation of Palestinians.
title: Israeli military’s killing of aid workers in Gaza ‘intentional’: UN expert

description: At least nine people have been killed and more than 900 others injured after Taiwan was rocked by its biggest earthquake in a quarter-century.
title: Nine dead, hundreds injured as strong quake hits Taiwan

description: This month’s deadly attack in Moscow has brought the Islamic State-Khorasan (IS-K) group back onto the international news agenda, as countries across the region are once again paying attention to this longstanding, but often ignored threat.
title: Moscow attack: Will Russia and Turkey intensify the fight against IS-K?

description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has signed a law that will lower the country’s minimum conscription age from 27 to 25, potentially boosting the number of men available to fight Russia’s invasion.
title: Zelensky signs law expanding draft age

description: A Palestinian American doctor walked out of a meeting with President Joe Biden before it was over Tuesday evening, underscoring the high tensions, anger and concern from Arab, Palestinian and Muslim American communities amid the Israel-Hamas war.
title: Palestinian American doctor walks out of Biden meeting in protest

description: U.S. President Joe Biden has approved the transfer of more bombs and fighter jets for Tel Aviv despite publicly voicing concern over the Israeli execution of its disastrous war on Gaza.
title: Biden approves huge arms package for Israel

description: TEHRAN - Since the 1979 Islamic Revolution, Iranian people have regularly held huge rallies in different occasions to show solidarity with Palestinian people in the face of Israel’s brutalities and acts of aggression.
title: Rallies, murals at Tehran’s Palestine Square

description: Belgium’s Foreign Minister Hadja Lahbib says the country will consider recognizing Palestinian statehood “when the moment comes”.
title: Belgian FM says open to Palestinian statehood

description: TEHRAN-Iran’s Art Bureau of the Islamic Ideology Dissemination Organization has orchestrated two visual art events in Syria and Cuba with a focus on endorsing the Palestinian resistance as the International Quds Day approaches.
title: Art Bureau organizes global art events in support of Palestine

description: TEHRAN-An exhibition of posters and illustrations by Iranian artists on the subject of Operation al-Aqsa Storm is underway in Borj el-Brajneh Camp in Beirut, Lebanon.
title: Iranian artists’ works on Operation al-Aqsa Storm on show in Lebanon

description: TEHRAN - Qeshm Island in the Persian Gulf hosted more than 750,000 travelers who explored its breathtaking landscapes and cultural attractions during the Persian New Year holiday period.
title: Over 750,000 holidaymakers visit Qeshm Island

description: TEHRAN - The iconic Mausoleum of Avicenna, nestled in the heart of Hamedan, has been aglow with a vibrant blue hue since April 2nd, which marks World Autism Awareness Day.
title: Avicenna Mausoleum illuminated blue in support of autism awareness

description: TEHRAN – As one of the most popular cultural destinations in Tehran in the spring holidays, the Carpet Museum of Iran has faced a 40% upsurge in the total number of visitors.
title: Nowruz boost: Iran’s carpet museum reports 40% surge in visitors

description: TEHRAN – As the Nowruz holidays [celebration of the Persian New Year] are officially over, Mazandaran’s tourism chief announced that the northern province has hosted more than 13 million travelers throughout the spring holidays.
title: Mazandaran’s nature embraces 13m visitors during Nowruz holidays

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Oil Ministry has created a stable market for knowledge-based companies, said a ministry official.
title: Oil Ministry creates stable market for knowledge-based companies: official

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Finance and Economic Affairs Minister Ehsan Khandouzi has said the rise in oil prices does not contribute to the improvement of Iran’s economic condition, Shana reported.
title: Iran’s economic growth has nothing to do with oil price hikes: minister

description: TEHRAN- Gas consumption in Iran increased by seven billion cubic meters in the past Iranian calendar year 1402 (ended on March 19), the head of the state-run National Iranian Gas Company (NIGC)’s Dispatching Department announced.
title: Annual gas consumption rises 7,000 mcm

description: TEHRAN- Transit of commodities through Iran increased by 36.52 percent during the previous Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19), as compared to the preceding year, according to the data released by the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA).
title: Annual transit of goods via Iran rises over 36%

description: TEHRAN – Iran exported more than 186,000 tons of fishery products worth $337.7 million in the first 11 months of the previous Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023-Februry 19, 2024), the latest data released by the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) showed.
title: Fishery exports exceed 186,000 tons in 11 months

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), gained 5,642 points on Wednesday to stand at 2,150,209.
title: TEDPIX gains 5,600 points on Wednesday

description: TEHRAN - In today’s rapidly evolving landscape of healthcare, the integration of data-driven methodologies has ignited a profound revolution in medical research.
title: Harnessing data for healthcare: innovations in medical research

description: TEHRAN –The World Food Program (WFP) has released its 2023 report on Iran based on the interim Country Strategic Plan (2023-2025).
title: WFP releases annual report on Iran

description: TEHRAN –In an effort to underscore the importance of safeguarding species, April 4 was declared in the Iranian calendar year 1393 (March 2014–March 2015) as the National Day of Genetic and Biological Reserves. A year later, it was designated on the national calendar.
title: The importance of biodiversity conservation

description: TEHRAN –The Meteorological Research Center has predicted an average normal to above-normal rainfall for the country over the six weeks ending May 12.
title: Normal, above-normal rainfall forecast by mid-May

description: TEHRAN – Iran started the opening day of 2024 WPV Sitting Volleyball Final Qualifiers for Women on high on Wednesday.
title: Iran down Japan at 2024 WPV Sitting Volleyball Final Qualifiers for Women
